why is it always in places like brisbane or sydney alone? Maurder, could there be another cosplay in the future where they are held in all major cities? cause some of us live far and couldn't travel that distance.

Riot will fly you in and set you up with accommodation and such. This is not a cosplay event; this is the grand final for OPL. They're just adding the cosplay part as an additional thing to come see and be part of and celebrate together as a community.

Hey, this is directed to Riot-ers.
I have an Academy Ahri cosplay and I'm currently 12. My b-day is 25/7/2003, so I'm 8 days away from 13 at the time it has to be entered. Is it close enough, or does it have to be to the book? Thanks!

In case you think it's unfair and are wondering why:
My guess is that because a lot of the outfits (the female ones specifically) show a fair bit of skin; it's just better to err on the side of caution and not risk having under-age people showing off what could basically be described as "child softcore porn".
Sorry, but the rule is over 18 before the 12th of August this year. {{champion:103}}
You must be over 18 years of age as off the 12th August 2016 in order to enter. i think thats one of the rules to enter
What about genderbend cosplays? So like a male version of Ahri or a female version of Darius for example. Would they be considered fan-made skins?
Maraudaur answered below and said "Crossplay is a okay, just no original skin designs for this competition."

What is your take on say Crossplay?


The reason I ask is that it makes mention of "must be a skin" etc so if I was a male BB Riven would that be disqualified?
Crossplay is a okay, just no original skin designs for this competition.

Riot should create a box at the start of normal games when in champ select such as make it random so its always not in the same position when seeing the [TOP] [MID] [JG] [ADC] and [SUP] boxes so when you join u have to click it to chose lanes you want instead of calling which causes issues. once click on your preferred position it then goes gray so other players cant click on it, which makes them have to choose something else.
